summary: An Ordinance providing for the improvement of certain streets, avenues, alleys, park ways, public lands and places, from a point beginning at the intersection of East Waterway and Lander Street; thence east along Lander Street to Ninth Avenue South; thence north along Ninth Avenue South to Bay View Street; thence east on Bay View Street to a connection with the South Tunnel at the alley between Tenth Avenue South and Eleventh Avenue South, all in the City of Seattle, by constructing a main trunk sewer and other appurtenances therein and thereon; providing for establishing a main trunk sewer, or drainage district, to be known as the "Lander Street Trunk Sewer District," and providing for the creation of Local Improvement District No. \_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_; all in accordance with Resolution No. 653 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, and providing for the payment therefor by the mode of "Payment by Bonds," as provided by the laws of the State of Washington and the Charter and Ordinances of the City of Seattle
